====== setCaching ======
^ API ^ Package ^ Class ^ phpDocumentor ^ Last reviewed ^ Doc status ^
| [[references:Joomla.Framework|{{http://api.joomla.org/media/images/package.png }}]] [[references:Joomla.Framework|Joomla.Framework]] | [[|{{http://api.joomla.org/media/images/package.png }}]] [[references:joomla.framework#Cache|Cache]] | [[JCache|{{http://api.joomla.org/media/images/Class.png }}]][[JCache|JCache]] | [[http://api.joomla.org/Joomla-Framework/Cache/JCache.html#setCaching|JCache->setCaching]] | Never | Public review |

Enables and disables caching.
===== Syntax =====
void setCaching	( **$enable** )
| **$enable** | boolean | is a flag which specifies whether or not caching should be enabled. |

===== Examples =====
Enable caching:
<code php|Example>
$cache = JFactory::getCache();

$cache->setCaching( true );
</code>

~~DISCUSSION~~
